channel.title: Documentation on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Installation
item.description: The following steps are here to help you initialize your new website. If you don’t know Hugo at all, we strongly suggest you learn more about it by following this great documentation for beginners. Tip The following tutorial leads you thru the steps of creating a first, minimal new site. You don’t need to edit any files besides your hugo.toml and only need to execute the commands in the given order.
